column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Varrick says : " Oh ... she really is gone . "
#Text=Baatar Jr. says : " Up and at 'em , Varrick !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " You 'll get your tea when you start working .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Well , I 'm really only productive for about fifteen minutes a day , usually in the afternoon around three - forty - five .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " You 'll work now .
#Text=I want you to show me how the device works .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What 's goin ' on ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Go back to sleep .
#Text=We only need Varrick .
#Text=You 'll need your energy when you get to the re-education camp .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I ca n't be expected to work without an assistant !
#Text=Without Zhu Li , I 'm helpless !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " One of the guards will be your assistant .
#Text=I 'll be supervising .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Well , I guess he 'll be fine .
#Text=As long as he does n't need his hands afterwards !
#Text=" Guard # 1 says : " What 's he talking about , sir ?

#Text=" Varrick says : " The last time we worked with the spirit vines , it created an uncontrollable blast that burned through a wall and could still be blowing up comets in space , as far as I know !
#Text=I would n't want to assist me if I were you !
#Text=" Guard # 1 says : " Maybe we should just let the kid help him out .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Fine .
#Text=Bolin can assist .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wait , what ?
#Text=I need my hands !
#Text=Uh , hold on !
#Text=Can we have breakfast first ?
#Text=While we still have hands ?
#Text=" Opal says : " Release them now !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " If Su agrees to bow to me and turn over Zaofu , she and the rest of your family will not be harmed .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Never !
#Text=I 'll never bow to you !
#Text=" Korra says : " There must be some way for us to resolve this !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I 've already laid out my terms , and I think they 're very reasonable .
#Text=After all , Su did try to take me out during our peaceful negotiations .
#Text=" Wei says : " You call bringing an army to threaten our city " peaceful " ?
#Text=" Opal says : " Where 's Bolin ?
#Text=I know he would never go along with this !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Bolin is with my fiancé , working on something very important .
#Text=But , I assure you , he 's on board with my plans .
#Text=You two have been apart for some time .
#Text=I guess you do n't realize how much Bolin has grown up .
#Text=Now turn over Zaofu .
#Text=" Korra says : " I ca n't just let you take the city !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Avatar Korra , you are interfering with internal Earth Empire business , and letting your personal feelings get in the way of reason .
#Text=Zaofu can not continue to rule itself .
#Text=They have been hoarding their riches and technology too long .
#Text=I 'm here to distribute those resources fairly throughout the nation .
#Text=This is about equality .
#Text=" Opal says : " You do n't care about equality !
#Text=This is about control !
#Text=Just take her down !
#Text=You know it 's the right thing to do !
#Text=You have to stop this !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " The only way you 're going to keep me from marching into Zaofu is if you physically stop me .
#Text=Now what are you going to do ?
#Text=" Korra says : " It looks like you 're not giving me a choice .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Fine .
#Text=I want you all to know that I would never ask any of you to do something that I 'm not willing to do myself .
#Text=So , rather than risk your lives , I will fight the Avatar one - on - one .
#Text=Korra , if you win , then you can do whatever you want with Zaofu .
#Text=But after I beat you , I want you out of my business for good .
#Text=I 'm the one who brought peace to the Earth Empire , not you .
#Text=You 're not relevant here anymore .
#Text=" Korra says : " Fine .
#Text=You wan na fight the Avatar ?
#Text=Then let 's finish this , right here , right now .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Are you really ready to fight her ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Just stay back and let me handle this .
#Text=It 's been a while , but I got a lot of pent - up rage .
#Text=" Opal says : " Do n't mess around !
#Text=Kuvira is too good !
#Text=Just go into the Avatar State and get it over with !
#Text=" Korra says : " No , I 'm only going to use that as a last resort .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Be careful .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Use whatever you want : all the elements ; the Avatar State ; anything you need .
#Text=I know you 're a little rusty .
#Text=" Korra says : " Enough talk !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Looks like the Avatar 's a little off her game !
#Text=" Opal says : " Do n't let her get you frustrated !
#Text=She wants you to make a mistake !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Bolin , do the thing .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What thing ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " The thing !
#Text=I never had to tell Zhu Li what thing !
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm not Zhu Li , okay ?
#Text=Pretend I do n't know anything about anything that 's happening here , also pretend I do n't want to build a super weapon or get my hands blown off !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Walk me through what you 're doing .
#Text=I want to know every detail of your work .
#Text=" Varrick says : " You know , when I started working with the vines , the point was to find a clean , unlimited source of energy , not develop some spirity death ray .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Clean energy !
#Text=Sounds great !
#Text=Who does n't like that stuff ?
#Text=Let 's do that instead !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Quiet !
#Text=You 're here to help , not talk .
#Text=And you of all people , should realize that once a discovery is made , it is our responsibility as scientists to pursue it as far as we can .
#Text=Wherever it leads .
#Text=" Varrick says : " How would you know ?
#Text=You could n't discover a wolfbat if it was building a nest in your butt .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " You 're pathetic .
#Text=Wolfbats do n't build nests .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Ooh .
#Text=You got me there , Dr. Science .
#Text=You 'll never know how it feels to give birth to genius , only to have it kidnapped , and raised by fools !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Are you done with your rambling , or do the guards need to encourage you to continue your work ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Okay , okay , The last time we ran the current through the vine we could n't control the power , so I 'm trying something new to see if I can direct it .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Come on , Avatar , get up !
#Text=Show me what you 've got !
#Text=" Opal says : " We have to help her !
#Text=" Korra says : " No !
#Text=Stay back !
#Text=I can handle this .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " So I see how the current interacts with the vine , and here is a kind of directional tube , but that is baffling here at the base .
#Text=It looks like that would only redirect the energy back where it came from .
#Text=And what 's that piece of equipment you 're fiddling with now on the power source ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Hand me the ... screw - turn - thingy , would ya ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ugh , I ca n't believe you 're helping them , you know this is n't right .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Funny story , Bolin .
#Text=I first got the idea for harnessing spirit power when I watched that giant Unalaq - monster attack the city from my jail cell .
#Text=That giant monster set me free !
#Text=Trust me , kid , I know what I 'm doing .
#Text=That ought to do it .
#Text=Huh .
#Text=Okay , stand back .
#Text=There we go !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " What 's that ticking ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " That 's the timer .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " The timer for what ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " For the bomb , of course !
#Text=" Bolin says : " What ?!
#Text=What bomb ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " The bomb that 's gon na explode in five minutes and destroy this entire train , all of the spirit vines , and everything else within a few hundred yards .
#Text=" Varrick says : " You know what , I 'd get out of here if I were you .
#Text=This is the first time I 've built a timer and it might run a little fast .
#Text=Bolin and I are ready to go down with the ship , or train , in this case , but you seem like you have a lot to live for .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Nononono !
#Text=I 'm not ready to go down with the ship , or the train !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " You 're bluffing .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Stick around five minutes and you 'll find out who 's bluffing .
#Text=You 'll be sorry you left me , Zhu Li !
#Text=When they write the history books , your name will be synonymous with betrayal !
#Text=People will say , " Hey , what happened to that guy ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Why do you have a timer and a remote ?

#Text=" Varrick says : " Well , first , I built the timer , but then I thought , you could drag me off the train , so then I built a remote , but then I thought , do I really need the timer , because now I got a remote in my -- Whatever !
#Text=I 'm covering all my bases !
#Text=The point is , you 're leaving , we 're staying !
#Text="
